children: For the evenly spaced grid we have a symmetric matrix. If it is not evenly spaced (i.e., dx is a vector), then we throw an error (TODO: implement a proper transpose).
Transpose for DerivativeOperator with non-uniform grid has yet to be implemented.
Fallback methods that use the full representation of the operator
The Inf opnorm can be calculated easily using the stencil coefficients, while other opnorms default to compute from the full matrix form.
